== Ubuntu Vancouver: Hardy Heron Release Party ==
'''An invitation to come to Vancouver's Hardy Heron release party!'''

Sponsored by <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam/Vancouver|Ubuntu Vancouver]]</nowiki>, 
<nowiki>[[http://freegeekvancouver.org/|Free Geek]]</nowiki>, and <nowiki>[[http://vanlug.bc.ca/|VanLUG]]</nowiki>.

=== When ===
Friday, April 25, 2008 at 7:00 PM to 10:00 PM

=== Where ===
Free Geek

1820 Pandora Street

Vancouver

<nowiki>[[http://freegeekvancouver.org/directions|directions]]</nowiki>

=== Activities ===
* Networking with fellow Ubuntu enthusiasts.
* Demonstrations of Hardy Heron (installs, upgrades, new features).
* Refreshments (pizza, chips, fruit, veggies, pop, juice, water).

Please R.S.V.P. to 
<nowiki>[[mailto:kim@kulak.ca?subject=RSVP%20Hardy%20Heron&body=Number%20of%20persons%20to%20attend%20=%20|Kim Kulak]]</nowiki>
so that we may get a good estimate of the number of people who plan to 
attend. Thank you.
